column1: Smoque BBQ////Being not the biggest fan of bbq
column2: I was shocked to say that I absolutely loved it...the pulled pork and brisket are AWESOME. The brisket has that char on the outside but is tender on the inside
column3: and the pork pulls part and is nice and charred with different textures. The babyback ribs weren't' as a big a hit w/the crew...I can't handle meat on the bone
